documentation.text: @dev Implementation of the {IERC20} interface as a sovereign moroccan crypto-currency

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Only Central Bank is allowed to call this"

arguments.value: Only Central Bank is allowed to call this

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Only Central Bank is allowed to call this"

documentation.text:
The treasure account is the "root" account on this currency
 param annualTaxRatePercent : percentage of the account that would be taxed in a year
                              tax is applied daily
 param umi : Universal Monthly Income
MED cyrpto-currency only uses "cents" or "centimes" as a subdivision

devdoc.details: Implementation of the {IERC20} interface as a sovereign moroccan crypto-currency

balanceOf(address).details: Returns the amount of tokens owned by `account`.

name().details: Returns the name of the token.

symbol().details: Returns the symbol of the token.

totalSupply().details: Returns the amount of tokens in existence.

transfer(address,uint256).details: Moves `amount` tokens from the caller's account to `recipient`. Returns a boolean value indicating whether the operation succeeded. Emits a {Transfer} event.

constructor.notice: The treasure account is the "root" account on this currency param annualTaxRatePercent : percentage of the account that would be taxed in a year                              tax is applied daily param umi : Universal Monthly Income
